EmailTemplate.description: This email is to be sent out as a Thank you email when a lead completes the form.
EmailTemplate.name: ES Talk To Us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Requesting to Speak with MBO Enterprise Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{First Name:default=Sir/Maddam}},
Thank you for your interest in speaking to us about MBO Enterprise Solutions.
Your request has been forwarded to our Enterprise Business Development team. Someone from the team will follow up with you soon to set up a time to speak about how MBO Enterprise Solutions can help your organization work with independent contractors more safely, efficiently, and productively.
Best regards,
Dave Putt Vice President, Enterprise Business Development MBO Enterprise Solutions An MBO Partners Company
